verses.verse: וְאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> now these שְׁמ֣וֹת <WH8034> Now these [are] the names הַשְּׁבָטִ֑ים <WH7626> of the tribes מִקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> end צָפ֡וֹנָה <WH6828> From the north אֶל־ <WH413> to יַ֣ד <WH3027> to the coast דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <WH1870> of the way חֶתְלֹ֣ן ׀ <WH2855> of Hethlon לְֽבוֹא־ <WH935> as one goeth חֲמָ֡ת <WH2574> to Hamath חֲצַ֣ר עֵינָן֩ <WH2704> Hazarenan גְּב֨וּל <WH1366> the border דַּמֶּ֤שֶׂק <WH1834> of Damascus צָפ֙וֹנָה֙ <WH6828> northward אֶל־ <WH413> to יַ֣ד <WH3027> to the coast חֲמָ֔ת <WH2574> of Hamath וְהָיוּ־ <WH1961> running ל֧וֹ פְאַת־ <WH6285> for these are his sides קָדִ֛ים <WH6921> east הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> [and] west דָּ֥ן <WH1835> [portion for] Dan אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> a

וְעַ֣ל ׀ <WH5921> Beside גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> And by the border דָּ֗ן <WH1835> of Dan מִפְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> side קָדִ֛ים <WH6921> from the east עַד־ <WH5704> against פְּאַת־ <WH6285> side יָ֖מָּה <WH3220> unto the west אָשֵׁ֥ר <WH836> [portion for] Asher אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> a

וְעַ֣ל ׀ <WH5921> Beside גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> And by the border אָשֵׁ֗ר <WH836> of Asher מִפְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> side קָדִ֛ימָה <WH6921> from the east וְעַד־ <WH5704> against פְּאַת־ <WH6285> side יָ֖מָּה <WH3220> even unto the west נַפְתָּלִ֥י <WH5321> [portion for] Naphtali אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> a

וְעַ֣ל ׀ <WH5921> Beside גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> And by the border נַפְתָּלִ֗י <WH5321> of Naphtali מִפְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> side קָדִ֛מָה <WH6921> from the east עַד־ <WH5704> against פְּאַת־ <WH6285> side יָ֖מָּה <WH3220> unto the west מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <WH4519> [portion for] Manasseh אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> a

וְעַ֣ל ׀ <WH5921> Beside גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> And by the border מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <WH4519> of Manasseh מִפְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> side קָדִ֛מָה <WH6921> from the east עַד־ <WH5704> against פְּאַת־ <WH6285> side יָ֖מָּה <WH3220> unto the west אֶפְרַ֥יִם <WH669> [portion for] Ephraim אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> a

וְעַ֣ל ׀ <WH5921> Beside גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> And by the border אֶפְרַ֗יִם <WH669> of Ephraim מִפְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> side קָדִ֛ים <WH6921> from the east וְעַד־ <WH5704> against פְּאַת־ <WH6285> side יָ֖מָּה <WH3220> even unto the west רְאוּבֵ֥ן <WH7205> [portion for] Reuben אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> a

וְעַ֣ל ׀ <WH5921> Beside גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> And by the border רְאוּבֵ֗ן <WH7205> of Reuben מִפְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> side קָדִ֛ים <WH6921> from the east עַד־ <WH5704> against פְּאַת־ <WH6285> side יָ֖מָּה <WH3220> unto the west יְהוּדָ֥ה <WH3063> [portion for] Judah אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> a

וְעַל֙ <WH5921> and by גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> And by the border יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah מִפְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> side קָדִ֖ים <WH6921> from the east עַד־ <WH5704> against פְּאַת־ <WH6285> side יָ֑מָּה <WH3220> unto the west תִּהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become הַתְּרוּמָ֣ה <WH8641> shall be the offering אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <WH834> which תָּרִ֡ימוּ <WH7311> which ye shall offer חֲמִשָּׁה֩ <WH2568> of five וְעֶשְׂרִ֨ים <WH6242> and twenty אֶ֜לֶף <WH505> thousand רֹ֗חַב <WH7341> [reeds in] breadth וְאֹ֜רֶךְ <WH753> and [in] length כְּאַחַ֤ד <WH259> as one הַחֲלָקִים֙ <WH2506> of the [other] parts מִפְּאַ֤ת <WH6285> side קָדִ֙ימָה֙ <WH6921> from the east עַד־ <WH5704> against פְּאַת־ <WH6285> side יָ֔מָּה <WH3220> unto the west וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become הַמִּקְדָּ֖שׁ <WH4720> and the sanctuary בְּתוֹכֽוֹ׃ <WH8432> shall be in the midst

הַתְּרוּמָ֕ה <WH8641> The oblation אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you תָּרִ֖ימוּ <WH7311> that ye shall offer לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֹ֗רֶךְ <WH753> in length חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <WH2568> [shall be] of five וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <WH6242> and twenty אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> thousand וְרֹ֖חַב <WH7341> in breadth עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <WH6235> and of ten אֲלָפִֽים׃ <WH505> thousand

וּ֠לְאֵ֜לֶּה <WH428> another תִּהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become תְרֽוּמַת־ <WH8641> oblation הַקֹּדֶשׁ֮ <WH6944> shall be [this] holy לַכֹּֽהֲנִים֒ <WH3548> And for them [even] for the priests צָפ֜וֹנָה <WH6828> toward the north חֲמִשָּׁ֧ה <WH2568> five וְעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> and twenty אֶ֗לֶף <WH505> thousand וְיָ֙מָּה֙ <WH3220> [in length] and toward the west רֹ֚חַב <WH7341> in breadth עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <WH6235> ten אֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> thousand וְקָדִ֗ימָה <WH6921> and toward the east רֹ֚חַב <WH7341> in breadth עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <WH6235> ten אֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> thousand וְנֶ֕גְבָּה <WH5045> and toward the south אֹ֕רֶךְ <WH753> in length חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <WH2568> five וְעֶשְׂרִ֖ים <WH6242> and twenty אָ֑לֶף <WH505> thousand וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become מִקְדַּשׁ־ <WH4720> and the sanctuary יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God בְּתוֹכֽוֹ׃ <WH8432> shall be in the midst

לַכֹּהֲנִ֤ים <WH3548> [It shall be] for the priests הַֽמְקֻדָּשׁ֙ <WH6942> that are sanctified מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons צָד֔וֹק <WH6659> of Zadok אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who שָׁמְר֖וּ <WH8104> which have kept מִשְׁמַרְתִּ֑י <WH4931> my charge אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not תָע֗וּ <WH8582> which went not astray בִּתְעוֹת֙ <WH8582> went astray בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who תָּע֖וּ <WH8582> went astray הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> as the Levites ס

וְהָיְתָ֨ה <WH1961> become לָהֶ֧ם תְּרוּמִיָּ֛ה <WH8642> And [this] oblation מִתְּרוּמַ֥ת <WH8641> that is offered הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land קֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> shall be unto them a thing most קָדָשִׁ֑ים <WH6944> holy אֶל־ <WH413> by גְּב֖וּל <WH1366> by the border הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> of the Levites

וְהַלְוִיִּ֗ם <WH3881> the Levites לְעֻמַּת֙ <WH5980> And over against גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> the border הַכֹּהֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> of the priests חֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <WH2568> [shall have] five וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and twenty אֶ֙לֶף֙ <WH505> thousand אֹ֔רֶךְ <WH753> in length וְרֹ֖חַב <WH7341> in breadth עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <WH6235> and ten אֲלָפִ֑ים <WH505> thousand כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֹ֗רֶךְ <WH753> all the length חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <WH2568> [shall be] five וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <WH6242> and twenty אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> thousand וְרֹ֖חַב <WH7341> and the breadth עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <WH6235> ten אֲלָפִֽים׃ <WH505> thousand

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> shall not יִמְכְּר֣וּ <WH4376> And they shall not sell מִמֶּ֗נּוּ <WH4480> any וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or יָמֵ֛ר <WH4171> of it neither exchange וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not [יַעֲבוּר כ] (יַעֲבִ֖יר <WH5674> alienate ק) רֵאשִׁ֣ית <WH7225> the firstfruits הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land כִּי־ <WH3588> for קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> for [it is] holy לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וַחֲמֵ֨שֶׁת <WH2568> And the five אֲלָפִ֜ים <WH505> thousand הַנּוֹתָ֣ר <WH3498> that are left בָּרֹ֗חַב <WH7341> in the breadth עַל־ <WH5921> over פְּנֵ֨י <WH6440> over against חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <WH2568> the five וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <WH6242> and twenty אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> thousand חֹֽל־ <WH2455> shall be a profane ה֣וּא <WH1931> he לָעִ֔יר <WH5892> [place] for the city לְמוֹשָׁ֖ב <WH4186> for dwelling וּלְמִגְרָ֑שׁ <WH4054> and for suburbs וְהָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> become הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> and the city [בְּתֹוכֹה כ] (בְּתֹוכֹֽו׃ <WH8432> hope ק)

וְאֵלֶּה֮ <WH428> another מִדּוֹתֶיהָ֒ <WH4060> And these [shall be] the measures פְּאַ֣ת <WH6285> side צָפ֗וֹן <WH6828> thereof the north חֲמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> and five מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> hundred וְאַרְבַּ֣עַת <WH702> four אֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> thousand וּפְאַת־ <WH6285> side נֶ֕גֶב <WH5045> and the south חֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> and five [חֲמֵשׁ <WH2568> fif כ] מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְאַרְבַּ֣עַת <WH702> four אֲלָפִ֑ים <WH505> thousand וּמִפְּאַ֣ת <WH6285> side קָדִ֗ים <WH6921> and on the east חֲמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> and five מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> hundred וְאַרְבַּ֣עַת <WH702> four אֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> thousand וּפְאַת־ <WH6285> side יָ֕מָּה <WH3220> and the west חֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> fif מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְאַרְבַּ֥עַת <WH702> four אֲלָפִֽים׃ <WH505> thousand

וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become מִגְרָשׁ֮ <WH4054> And the suburbs לָעִיר֒ <WH5892> of the city צָפ֙וֹנָה֙ <WH6828> shall be toward the north חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> and fifty וּמָאתַ֔יִם <WH3967> two hundred וְנֶ֖גְבָּה <WH5045> and toward the south חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> and fifty וּמָאתָ֑יִם <WH3967> two hundred וְקָדִ֙ימָה֙ <WH6921> and toward the east חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> and fifty וּמָאתַ֔יִם <WH3967> two hundred וְיָ֖מָּה <WH3220> and toward the west חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> and fifty וּמָאתָֽיִם׃ <WH3967> two hundred

וְהַנּוֹתָ֨ר <WH3498> And the residue בָּאֹ֜רֶךְ <WH753> in length לְעֻמַּ֣ת ׀ <WH5980> over against תְּרוּמַ֣ת <WH8641> the oblation הַקֹּ֗דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the holy עֲשֶׂ֨רֶת <WH6235> [portion shall be] ten אֲלָפִ֤ים <WH505> thousand קָדִ֙ימָה֙ <WH6921> eastward וַעֲשֶׂ֤רֶת <WH6235> and ten אֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> thousand יָ֔מָּה <WH3220> westward וְהָיָ֕ה <WH1961> become לְעֻמַּ֖ת <WH5980> and it shall be over against תְּרוּמַ֣ת <WH8641> the oblation הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the holy וְהָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> become [תְבוּאָתֹה כ] (תְבֽוּאָתֹו֙ <WH8393> ark ק) לְלֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> thereof shall be for food לְעֹבְדֵ֖י <WH5647> unto them that serve הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> the city

וְהָעֹבֵ֖ד <WH5647> And they that serve הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> the city יַעַבְד֕וּהוּ <WH5647> shall serve מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> of all שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> it out of all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הַתְּרוּמָ֗ה <WH8641> All the oblation חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <WH2568> [shall be] five וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <WH6242> and twenty אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> thousand בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <WH2568> by five וְעֶשְׂרִ֖ים <WH6242> and twenty אָ֑לֶף <WH505> thousand רְבִיעִ֗ית <WH7243> foursquare תָּרִ֙ימוּ֙ <WH7311> ye shall offer אֶת־ <WH853> תְּרוּמַ֣ת <WH8641> oblation הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> the holy אֶל־ <WH413> with אֲחֻזַּ֖ת <WH272> with the possession הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> of the city

וְהַנּוֹתָ֣ר <WH3498> And the residue לַנָּשִׂ֣יא <WH5387> [shall be] for the prince מִזֶּ֣ה ׀ <WH2088> he וּמִזֶּ֣ה ׀ <WH2088> he לִתְרֽוּמַת־ <WH8641> oblation הַקֹּ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> on the one side and on the other of the holy וְלַאֲחֻזַּ֪ת <WH272> and of the possession הָעִ֟יר <WH5892> of the city אֶל־ <WH413> over פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> over against חֲמִשָּׁה֩ <WH2568> the five וְעֶשְׂרִ֨ים <WH6242> and twenty אֶ֥לֶף ׀ <WH505> thousand תְּרוּמָה֮ <WH8641> of the oblation עַד־ <WH5704> against גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> border קָדִימָה֒ <WH6921> toward the east וְיָ֗מָּה <WH3220> and westward עַל־ <WH5921> toward פְּ֠נֵי <WH6440> over against חֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <WH2568> the five וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and twenty אֶ֙לֶף֙ <WH505> thousand עַל־ <WH5921> toward גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> border יָ֔מָּה <WH3220> toward the west לְעֻמַּ֥ת <WH5980> over against חֲלָקִ֖ים <WH2506> the portions לַנָּשִׂ֑יא <WH5387> for the prince וְהָֽיְתָה֙ <WH1961> become תְּרוּמַ֣ת <WH8641> oblation הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> and it shall be the holy וּמִקְדַּ֥שׁ <WH4720> and the sanctuary הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> of the house [בְּתֹוכֹה כ] (בְּתֹוכֹֽו׃ <WH8432> hope ק)

וּמֵאֲחֻזַּ֤ת <WH272> Moreover from the possession הַלְוִיִּם֙ <WH3881> of the Levites וּמֵאֲחֻזַּ֣ת <WH272> and from the possession הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> of the city בְּת֛וֹךְ <WH8432> [being] in the midst אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לַנָּשִׂ֖יא <WH5387> [of that] which is the prince's יִֽהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> belongs בֵּ֣ין ׀ <WH996> between גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> between the border יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah וּבֵין֙ <WH996> between גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> and the border בִּנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> of Benjamin לַנָּשִׂ֖יא <WH5387> shall be for the prince יִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> belongs

וְיֶ֖תֶר <WH3499> As for the rest הַשְּׁבָטִ֑ים <WH7626> of the tribes מִפְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> side קָדִ֛ימָה <WH6921> from the east עַד־ <WH5704> against פְּאַת־ <WH6285> side יָ֖מָּה <WH3220> unto the west בִּנְיָמִ֥ן <WH1144> Benjamin אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> [shall have] a

וְעַ֣ל ׀ <WH5921> Beside גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> And by the border בִּנְיָמִ֗ן <WH1144> of Benjamin מִפְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> side קָדִ֛ימָה <WH6921> from the east עַד־ <WH5704> against פְּאַת־ <WH6285> side יָ֖מָּה <WH3220> unto the west שִׁמְע֥וֹן <WH8095> Simeon אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> [shall have] a
